Package se.arkalix.core.plugin

Class HttpJsonServiceDiscovery

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.arkalix.core.plugin.HttpJsonServiceDiscovery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    se.arkalix.ArConsumer, ArServiceDiscovery
    public class HttpJsonServiceDiscovery
extends java.lang.Object
implements ArServiceDiscovery
    A remote ArServiceDiscovery service that is communicated with via HTTP/JSON in either secure or insecure mode.
